SUBSTITUTE WITH HUMANN3 RESULTS WHEN I CAN

```{r}
pheno <- read_csv('../data/shotgun_pheno/final_simplified.csv') %>% 
  gather('pheno', 'value', cr_d30:toxicity) 

sub_phenos <- pheno %>% 
  split(., list(.$center, .$pheno)) %>% 
  purrr::imap(~ filter(.data = ., value != 'not_assessed'))
```

```{r}
# the pheno for the different center and tox/CR_d30
sub_phenos %>% 
  imap(function(.x, .y){
    select(.data = .x, value) %>% 
      t() %>% 
      write.table(str_glue('../data/shotgun_output/humann2/{.y}.txt'), sep = '\t', quote = F, row.names = T, col.names = F)
  })
```

```{r}
# the pathway counts table
full <- read_tsv('../data/shotgun_output/humann2/humann2_pathabundance_CART.tsv') %>% 
  select(!ends_with('_1'), MS_UPENN_1)


pcts <- sub_phenos %>% 
  map(~ pull(.data = ., fid) ) %>% 
  imap(~ full %>% select(`# Pathway`, matches(.x)) %>% 
         write_tsv(str_glue('../data/shotgun_output/humann2/{.y}_pcts.tsv'))) 
```

```{r}
fns <- list.files('../data/shotgun_output/humann2/', pattern = '_lefse_ready.tsv')

cmds <- tibble(
  fns = fns
) %>% 
  transmute(format_cmd = str_glue('format_input.py {fns}  {fns}.in -c 1 -u 2 -o 1000000')) %>% 
  mutate(run_cmd = str_glue('run_lefse.py {fns}.in  {fns}.res')) %>% 
  mutate(plot_cmd = str_glue('plot_res.py {fns}.res {fns}.png  --feature_font_size 4 --width 10 --dpi 300')) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  select(value) %>% 
  write_csv('../data/shotgun_output/humann2/lefse_cmd.sh', col_names = F)
cmds

```
